sourceMeaningMnemonic: Put a <radical>sock</radical> in a <radical>building</radical> and it turns into an <kanji>enclosure</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Why? Because that sock is now enclosed in that building!
readingMnemonic: Now that you have an <kanji>enclosure</kanji>, let's go deeper. Put a <reading>cock</reading> (<ja>かく</ja>) in the sock and it becomes an enclosure inside an enclosure.
readingInfo: Picture this inception enclosure mess in your mind and you'll never forget this kanji, I promise.
